=== NEWS ARTICLE ===
Title: Buy Hatsun Agro Products; target of Rs 1190: ICICI Securities
Source: Moneycontrol - News
Published: 2024-04-23 06:16
Related Stocks: RELIANCE, ICICI
Categories: general

Summary:
ICICI Securities is bullish on Hatsun Agro Products recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 1190 in its research report dated April 23, 2024.

Sentiment: positive
